name: KeyboardState

properties.name: keyName
properties.description: A string containing the name of the currently pressed key, such as "a", or an empty string.

properties.name: shiftKey
properties.description: True if the Shift key is pressed.

properties.name: ctrlKey
properties.description: True if the Ctrl key is pressed.

properties.name: altKey
properties.description: True if the Alt or Option key is pressed.

properties.name: metaKey
properties.description: True if the Cmd key (in Mac OS) or Windows key (in Windows) is pressed.

description: Reports the active state of the keyboard.
